entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 6:43 PM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
